line_1: But can't, in honour, break his evening party.
line_2: Then swears, he to the charity is hearty,

line_1: Cupid was with Him of the Party;
line_2: And show'd himself sincere and hearty:

line_1: And made a good Meal, like the rest of the Party,
line_2: What, tho' at Devizes I fed pretty hearty,

line_1: That he was always of their party,
line_2: And that they knew him firm and hearty,
